document_data.mainbody:
eldars Trail, also called the Mosstree Trail, was a trail that ran through the Vast, connecting the town of Mossbridges and the village of Fallentree.
From west to east, it began at Mossbridges, ran through Highbank Forest and Dark Hollow, and ended at Fallentree. On the way, it linked with the Tantras Trail, the Hlintar Ride, and Blaerns Trail.
